abstrac: Inbound marketing builds leads and sales
bio:
Over the last 5 years I have helped my clients use paid search (PPC) to
generate leads for their business. I specialize in lead generating strategies
and tactics using PPC. I am an experienced PPC and SEO expert that understands

the technical aspects of search marketing as well as the direct marketing

I have been in the online marketing space since 2004, when as a result of selling my own business I started working with a friend's Network Support company, That company was losing about $100,000 per year on revenues of $2,000,000.
 
My friend asked me to step in as General Manager and help turn the business around (I had prior experience in that field) and since we didn't have marketing funds, I taught myself online marketing as well as PPC. Bottom line, a year later the company profits where increased to $400,000 and sales had increased a million dollars.
Facebook ads, ppc marketing, inbound marking

bio:
Hello there !
I'm Matteo, a freelancer web developer and designer from Italy currently living in London.

I've been conding since I was 16, but just two years ago I decided that I would have been my job !

I have an excellent knowledge of HTML (5 and 4.01), XHTML, CSS (3 and 2.1), good knowledge of Wordpress. Basic knowledge of PHP, mySQL, Javascript, JQuery, SEO, Google Adwords, Analytics and WebMaster Tools.

I have an excellent knowledge of Photoshop and Dreamweaver as well.

I can work anyday of the weeks at every hour you need (if you need a work to be done for the next morning, I can) !
My hour pay rate is 7£ (more or less 11$).
You can contact me via email, skype and (if you live in London) we can meet to talk about all the details of the project.

description.title: Every website deserves to be AWESOME
description: I'm a freelance webdeveloper (infected primary by front-end development) based in Prague with 8+ years of experience in webdevelopment. I'm building websites using HTML5, CSS3 (LESS/SASS) and JavaScri…

abstrac: Hello, I'm Filip Bartos. A web enthusiast, creativity and simplicity lover based in Prague.
bio:
My name is Filip Bartos and I'm a webdeveloper with 6+ years of experience in web development. I specialize in creating modern, user-friendly, responsive and beautiful websites. In my work I'm using latest W3C web standards guidlines and technologies. 

For building websites I'm using especially PHP, clean and semantic HTML (including HTML5), CSS (including CSS3/LESS/SASS), JavaScript (including jQuery, I developed several plugins for jQuery, see http://www.bartos.me/heapbox/), Twitter Bootstrap. I'm creating layouts using Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator.

I have expert level experience with the following: CSS, HTML, PHP (OOP), JavaScript, jQuery, Twitter Bootstrap, Git, JSON, XML, SQL/MySQL, AJAX, Linux, SEO, Photoshop, Image manipulation and problem solving :)
My native language is Czech but I can speak also in English. In English I prefer written communication (Skype/mail etc...)
